label: 弓箭
対訳語: bow and arrow, refers to the warrior social order.
本: State of War: the Violent Order of Fourteenth Century Japan . Michigan University Press . 2003
説明文: Literally bow and arrow," but refers to the warrior social order. Tozama used such language to describe themselves in the fourteenth century. References exist for phrases such as the "house of the bow in arrow" (yumiya no ie); the "way of the bow and arrow" (yumiya no michi); and the "honor of the bow and arrow" (yumiya no menboku). [弓箭の家、弓箭の道、弓箭の面目]"
